title: Jinxiu Shenzhou Zhi Xingshi Wangguo
sinopse: In ancient times, on the land of China, the eight kingdoms named Ji, Ying, Jiang, Yao, Si, 妘, 姞, and 妫 were gathered by surnames. There are imperial spiritual masters all over the land of Shenzhou. They use lanterns with their surnames as the medium to summon guardian spirits of different attributes, thus possessing the power to overwhelm the river and the sea. It is the dream of all the guardian spirits to become the strongest guardian spirit master bred in the tree of surnames through layers of tests! The ordinary boy without a surname in Sunny, accidentally obtained a powerful guardian spirit with the most special lantern without a surname. Since then, he has been accidentally and thrilled, and embarked on a wonderful journey of collecting surname fire with his friends. The adventure is full of thrills but full of laughter. A seemingly impossible task has unexpected results. versus(translated from iqiyi)
